parameter.name: remind-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: remind Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: SERVER=localhost; DATABASE=RemindMe; USER ID=sa; PASSWORD=12345; MIN POOL SIZE = 5; MAX POOL SIZE=100;

parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
